description: Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi today visited Telangana to inaugurate various developmental projects. PM Modi inaugurated Mission Bhagiratha, a scheme to provide piped drinking water to household
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
At the public meeting in Telangana, spoke on the vitality of cooperative federalism & why it is key for India’s growth that Centre & states work together. 

Talked about power sector reforms, irrigation & how we are linking economic progress with rail connectivity. http://nm-4.com/fu4t
